### Exercise 24
Write out the first 5 terms of the Binomial series with the given k-value.

#### $k = 4$

When $k = 4$, the first 5 terms of the Binomial series with the given k-value are as follows:

$1+k+{ \left( 1+x \right)  }^{ k }+k{ \left( 1+k \right)  }^{ k-1 }+k\left( k-1 \right) { \left( 1+x \right)  }^{ k-2 }$
